data.title: Red Sox/MLB - 2024 Regular Season IV - Major League Baseball will play its first game ever in Tennessee in 2025
data.meta_description:

data.meta_site_name: HFBoards - NHL Message Board and Forum for National Hockey League
data.text:
Romy using the "special sauce" ...I mean look at his Baseball Reference page all the way back to college...makes you go hmmmm...

That said, I'll take it

Romy using the "special sauce" ...I mean look at his Baseball Reference page all the way back to college...makes you go hmmmm...

That said, I'll take it

It's the 'stache.

Remember the "Fear the Beard" team? It brings an aura.

we all said at minimum 2 out of 3 in KC.... if not all 3.... which put us back in the WC Race, as KC is imploding here if they've got the 3rd WC spot

Please put Crawford on the phantom IL.

I beg.

gotta skip him for a couple weeks maybe more - get fitts/penrod up there something. I'd rather not go back to the winck stuff but kutter can't keep going like this.

f***ed by the ump this inning

Usually I agree with you but no this has been all on Crawford

gotta skip him for a couple weeks maybe more - get fitts/penrod up there something. I'd rather not go back to the winck stuff but kutter can't keep going like this.

It's clear he's gotta sit. Can't keep putting him out there. He looks lost.

Bernardino serving up a f***ing meatball to Pasaqulino there

f***ing gross.

Usually I agree with you but no this has been all on Crawford

That walk to Massey was brutal but I’m referring to the Melendez at-bat. That was a long battle that he won and the ump porked him. Everything after is on him

That walk to Massey was brutal but I’m referring to the Melendez at-bat. That was a long battle that he won and the ump porked him. Everything after is on him

Yeah but usually when pitchers are obviously doing awful, the umps don't give them the benefit of the doubt. And I saw that pitch, it was out of the strike zone even though it looked deceiving by how that guy bats.

Trevor Story doing fielding drills? Batting?

Color me flabbergasted. Maybe it is true he'll come back this season.

5 and 1/2 weeks left in the Minor league Regular season

Tell Trevor that

as it stands now Worcester isn't likely to get in..... Portland might.... but will the team elect a rehab assignment instead of readding Story outright to the roster

Yeah but usually when pitchers are obviously doing awful, the umps don't give them the benefit of the doubt. And I saw that pitch, it was out of the strike zone even though it looked deceiving by how that guy bats.

Trevor Story doing fielding drills? Batting?

Color me flabbergasted. Maybe it is true he'll come back this season.

Can’t say the guy doesn’t work his ass off/care, that’s for sure

6 and 1/2 weeks but got the point.

it's actually 5 AND 1/2 BECAUSE they just stated Monday it was six weeks left as Portland has the edge to play Hartford after barely missing the 1st half clincher due to weather issues when the ALL Star break HAPPENED... it's why they went 1 off day and 6 gm sets after years of 70-70

@CDJ alright perhaps I was thinking of another batter/pitch.
